channel.title: My Blog Page
channel.description: Travel news from all around the world

item.title: US Virgin Islands to welcome new JetBlue connection
item.description: The United States Virgin Islands will welcome new flights from the New York tri-state area this summer.

item.title: Princess Cruises scraps international summer sailing from UK
item.description: Princess Cruises has become the latest line to scrap plans for international sailing from the UK over the summer.

item.title: Hong Kong Tourism Board prepares for reopening of travel
item.description: The Hong Kong Tourism Board (HKTB) has announced its plan to prepare for the recovery of tourism

item.title: Seychelles to reopen to tourism this month
item.description: The Seychelles will reopen to tourists, regardless of vaccination status, from March 25th.

item.title: Eurowings to boost presence in Berlin as rivals depart
item.description: Eurowings is stepping up its commitment in Berlin and will open a new base at Berlin Brandenburg Airport

item.title: Thailand's Tourism Sector Campaigning to Reopen by July
item.description: Tourism officials in Thailand have announced a new campaign to reopen the countryâ€™s borders

item.title: Where can I travel?
item.description: Which Popular World Destinations Can American Travelers Visit Right Now?
